title: Uh why is kayn a two shot champion
body: Excuse me riot do you see this?{{champion:141}}

replies.body: What champs aren't two shots anymore?

> [{quoted}](name=Sona Ping,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XnoB8YOW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-04-23T01:19:50.907+0000)
>
> What champs aren't two shots anymore?

this is sad but true,, almost most are actaully 3-4. so it tankes about .5-1 seconds to rather than .3

he isn't.

if he can 2 shot you, you let him get ahead far more then your tanks.

if you know how to apply pressure on kayn, you can shut him down fast.

> [{quoted}](name=breakordoom444,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XnoB8YOW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-23T00:48:11.789+0000)
>
> he isn't.
> 
> if he can 2 shot you, you let him get ahead far more then your tanks.
> 
> if you know how to apply pressure on kayn, you can shut him down fast.

So every time the enemy has a {{champion:141}} its out job tyo leave our lanes and help pressure him... now why didn't i think of that?

you can delay him all you want... he still is going to 2 shot you when he finishes {{item:3147}}
